summary: Building QUICK BEE AGENCY OS - a full-stack automation-enabled agency management web app. Starting with Phase 1: Lead Management CRM with downloadable data, black + teal theme, modern minimal UI. Future phases will add proposal generation, payment integration (Razorpay), WhatsApp automation, sequence builder, client portal, and onboarding automation.
architectural_notes: Project: QUICK BEE AGENCY OS - agency management automation platform
Phase 1 focus: Lead Management CRM with downloadable exports
Future modules planned: WhatsApp automation, proposal generator, Razorpay payment integration, sequence builder, client portal, onboarding automation
Design system: Black + teal accents, glassmorphism, modern minimal SaaS dashboard
Lead status workflow: new_lead → qualified → proposal_sent → paid → onboarding → completed
Database structure: leads table with id, name, phone, email, service_interest, status, created_at

existing_features.title: Add CSV export functionality to the leads table allowing admin users to download all lead data including id, name, phone, email, service_interest, status, and created_at fields

Integrate Razorpay payment gateway with automated payment flow: generate payment links when lead status changes to 'qualified', listen for payment webhooks, and automatically update lead status to 'paid' on successful payment confirmation
Add Razorpay configuration panel in the admin settings page allowing storage and editing of Razorpay API key, secret, and webhook secret

Create automated notification system that triggers when lead status changes: send notification when status moves to 'qualified' (payment link ready), 'paid' (payment confirmed), or 'onboarding' (project started)
Add bulk actions to leads table allowing admin to select multiple leads and update their status, export selected leads, or delete selected leads in one operation

new_feature_requests.summary: Lead Management CRM with table (id, name, phone, email, service_interest, status, created_at), admin edit status, search/filter by status, lead detail view
Make all lead data downloadable (CSV/PDF export)
Apply black + teal green theme with glassmorphism cards, soft shadows, smooth animations, responsive design
